questions.question_text:
DRAG DROP
-

A company is assessing Microsoft 365 Apps.

You need to identify the Microsoft 365 Apps application that supports each feature.

Which application should you use? To answer, drag the appropriate Microsoft 365 Apps applications to the correct features. Each Microsoft 365 Apps application may be used once, more than once, or not at all. You may need to drag the split bar between panes or scroll to view content.

NOTE: Each correct selection is worth one point.

//IMG//

discussion.content: This is correct. All other options require some form of license to have been previously purchased.

A is correct option: Full USLs are for new customers who haven't previously purchased Microsoft products and services.

Reference link:
https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/training/paths/m365-licensing-service-support/?source=recommendations

questions.question_text:
HOTSPOT
-

A company plans to deploy Microsoft 365.

The company has not deployed any Microsoft products. The company requires a user subscription license (USL) that minimizes license costs.

You need to identify which license solution to use.

Select the answer that correctly completes the sentence.

//IMG//

discussion.content:
-**System-assigned** managed identities are deleted when the parent Azure resource is deleted and are specific to that resource.
-**User-assigned** managed identities are independent of any resource and must be explicitly assigned and managed, making them versatile and shareable among multiple resources.

questions.question_text:
DRAG DROP
-

A company is evaluating Microsoft 365 identity and access management solutions.

You need to describe the differences between user- and system-assigned managed identity solutions.

Which managed identities should you describe? To answer, drag the appropriate managed identities to the correct descriptions. Each managed identity may be used once, more than once, or not at all. You may need to drag the split bar between panes or scroll to view content.

NOTE: Each correct selection is worth one point.

//IMG//

DRAG DROP
-

A company plans to use Microsoft 365 Defender.

You need to identify the tools that support the Microsoft 365 Defender features.

Which tool should you identify? To answer, drag the appropriate tools to the correct features. Each tool may be used once, more than once, or not at all. You may need to drag the split bar between panes or scroll to view content.

NOTE: Each correct selection is worth one point.

//IMG//

discussion.content:
Keyword is "corporate" website, it should not be required:
https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/microsoft-365/bookings/bookings-faq?view=o365-worldwide
